metadata.name: GEEK
metadata.description:
Coin-Artist Izabela Quasha is the artist behind a new concept of art called Cointilllism. 
“Cointillism was inspired by my previous project called Gem Pointillism, where I combine art with jewelry by "painting" with gemstones. In Cointillism I use high-resolution photos of jewels to create unique art pieces. Each collage is one of a kind and carries a message”.
